===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}

===Etymology===
{{och-l|非|tr=*pɯj}} is the fusion of the negation particle {{och-l|不|not}} and the copula {{och-l|惟|to be}}, attested in [[oracle bone script|oracle bone inscriptions]].

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[not]] [[be]]; [[is]] not; [[not]]
#* {{zh-x|非常|unusual}}
#* {{zh-x|非法|illegal}}
# [[wrong]]; [[incorrect]]
#* {{zh-x|是非|right and wrong}}
# to [[reproach]]; to [[blame]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{n-g|Used to insist on something.}} to [[have]] [[got]] to; to simply [[must]]
#* {{zh-x|不行，我 非 得{děi} 走。|No, I must go.}}
# {{zh-abbrev|非洲|[[Africa]]}}
